# AxisValueLabelOrientation

**Structure**

Describes the orientation of a label.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AxisValueLabelOrientation
```

## Type Properties

- **automatic**
- **horizontal**: A horizontal label
- **vertical**: A vertical label, reading top down.
- **verticalReversed**: A vertical label, reading bottom up.

## Supporting types

- **AxisValueLabelCollisionResolution**

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible

items.description: A vertical label, reading top down.
items.name: vertical

items.description: A vertical label, reading bottom up.
items.name: verticalReversed

title: AxisValueLabelOrientation
